docs.snippet: Facebook Inc on Wednesday expanded its live video product, Facebook Live, giving the feature prominent placement on its app and rolling out features to make it easier for users to search and comment in real time....

docs.snippet: This new USA Network drama follows three characters whose vivid dreamscapes complicate their already complex real lives....

docs.abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television series Falling Water, premiering on USA Network.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Falling Water,’ Real Life’s Hard. Dreams Are Worse.
headline.print_headline: Real Life Is Hard Enough. But the Dreams Are Way Worse.

docs.snippet: The social-bookmarking site enters the competition with Facebook, Twitter and others vying for a share of the increasing amounts marketers are spending on digital ads....
docs.lead_paragraph: The social-bookmarking site enters the competition with Facebook, Twitter and others vying for a share of the increasing amounts marketers are spending on digital ads.
docs.abstract: Pinterest is selling video ads that combine links to featured products, known as Promoted Video Pins, to appear on its feed; move is designed to help social-bookmarking site compete with social media and digital publishers.

headline.main: Pinterest Follows Rivals Into Selling Video Ads
headline.print_headline: Pinterest Joins a Crowd in Video Ads

docs.snippet: If you can’t tell me how my personal information is going to be protected when you ask for it, don’t expect me to give it you. And you should do the same when someone asks you....
